com.github.tommyettinger.anim8

Class OtherMath.BiasGain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation
      • com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath.BiasGain
  • Enclosing class:
    OtherMath

    public static class OtherMath.BiasGain
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation
    A wrapper around OtherMath.barronSpline(float, float, float) to use it as an Interpolation. Useful because it can imitate the wide variety of symmetrical Interpolations by setting turning to 0.5 and shape to some value greater than 1, while also being able to produce the inverse of those interpolations by setting shape to some value between 0 and 1.
